description:
Cogit is a daily puzzle game that challenges players to create basic equations that reach the target numbers. Each day offers a fresh puzzle with a new set of numbers to work with.

As the week progresses, the difficulty of the puzzles gradually increases. Monday's puzzles are relatively simple and can be solved quickly, while Saturday's puzzles are notoriously challenging and may require a significant amount of time to solve. Sunday's puzzles are unpredictable and may present a unique challenge that differs from the rest of the week.
name: Cogit
